EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You for Joining Pivotal and the Spring Team at Devoxx UK 2015
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Did we meet you, or did you hear from us at Devoxx UK <http://www.devoxx.co.uk/>? We’re coming to conferences like Devoxx to specifically to help developers learn that cloud-native application architectures aren’t just available to pioneers like Netflix anymore - Spring and Cloud Foundry are making it accessible. Grab a free copy of the 50 page concept primer from O'Reilly - “Migrating to Cloud Native Application Architecture <http://blog.pivotal.io?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=pov-newsletter-7-7-15>”.
If you weren't able to catch our talks, cool schwag, or technology, here’s a quick recap:
- Dr. Dave Syer showed developers how NetFlixOSS components are being integrated into the Spring programming model with “Microservices made easy with Spring Cloud”. - Josh Long showed us the container at base of the Spring microservice stack, Spring Boot in his talk “Bootiful Applications with Spring Boot”.
- Familiar with Kubernetes or Mesos? Great! Download Lattice.cf <http://lattice.cf> today and get started with Spring Cloud via vagrant on your local machine or via AWS, using Cloud Foudry’s advanced “diego” scheduler, self-healing, http load balancer, and log aggregation.
If NetflixOSS gets you excited about the future, make sure to learn more now:
- CF Summit 2015 talk: Deploying Microservice Architectures with Cloud Foundry <https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DBIm6gDpSNg>
- Check out the Spring Cloud Services 1.0.0 beta <https://network.pivotal.io/products/p-spring-cloud-services>, which integrates the open source Spring Cloud project <http://projects.spring.io/spring-cloud> with Pivotal Cloud Foundry. - Sign up for two months of Free Pivotal Web Services <http://run.pivotal.io>, simply the best public cloud environment for hosting Spring & Java applications available today.
- Coté and Andrew Clay Shafer talk about DevOps - in one of our recent Pivotal Conversations podcasts. - Learn about the Cloud-Native Enterprise from James Watters’ CF Summit keynote here
Stay in touch with Pivotal and join the conversation on our blogs <http://spring.io/blog>, YouTube <http://spring.io/video>, and on Twitter <https://twitter.com/springcentral>.
We hope to see you again soon at a future event <https://pivotal.io/news-events?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=devoxx-uk-q315>!
The Spring Team at Pivotal Software
